column4: hey guys i had just reinstalled linux (im not a noob) and my .bash_profile was gane!
oh can i make grub the main bootloader instead of longhorn
How do u make grub the main boot loader (i mean when u click the power button on your cpu)
im saing i have vista when i turn on my cpu i see vistas boot loader but i want to see grub
that's what you need to do.
wubi only uses the windows bootloader.
you don't with your current set up.  You'd have to do a proper dualboot
edit your boot.ini, there's a default line.  You might ask in ##windows for actual specifics.
Why do you need to log in to a GUI with root?
Which file, if you don't mind me asking?
You shouldn't need sudo something to move it to your own home folder
